attributes.action: ensure there is more multicultural education in UK state schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While religious education is a compulsory subject in the state education system in the UK there should be greater efforts made to infuse areas of education with multicultural education.
 
Schools are a vital source for creating social cohesion and encouraging cultural diversity in multicultural Britain. Without such education promoting social cohesion society disintegrates. This is the ideal, now the government needs to consider making greater efforts to ensure this a reality.
